meanings.definition: To produce a quavering or warbling sound.
meanings.sent1: The bird was trilling a beautiful melody in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys trilling along with her favorite songs on the radio.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried trilling like a bird, but it sounded funny.
meanings.sent4: The wind trilling through the trees created a soothing symphony.
meanings.sent5: Her laughter echoed through the room, trilling with joy.

meanings.sent1: The trilling of the flute filled the air with music.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the trilling of the birds outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The trilling of the phone interrupted their conversation.
meanings.sent4: The trilling of the violin evoked a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The trilling of the stream was a peaceful backdrop to their picnic.
